description.description: Description is a description of this argument.

required.description: Required denotes this argument as required.

default.description:
Default is the default value for this argument if it's not set.
This cannot be set when required is true.

schema.description: Schema is a JSON schema, in YAML, for the argument.

from.description:
From is a reference to an argument in another module, if this is
set, all other fields are ignored and instead the module referenced
field's are used instead. The name of the argument, the key in the map,
must be the same across both modules.

Argument.description: Argument is a user-input argument that can be passed to templates

name.description: Name is the name of the command being ran, used for UX

command.description:
Command is the command to be ran, note: this is ran inside
of a bash shell.

PostRunCommandSpec.description: PostRunCommandSpec is the spec of a command to be ran and its friendly name

name.description: Name is the name of this module. This should be a valid go import path

channel.description:
Channel is the channel to use for updates to this module
Defaults to "stable"

version.description:
Version is a semantic version or branch of the template repository
that should be downloaded if not set then the latest version is used.

Version can also be a constraint as supported by the underlying resolver:
https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/getoutreach/gobox/pkg/cli/updater/resolver#Resolve

TemplateRepository.description: TemplateRepository is a repository of template files.

name.description:
Name is the name of this template repository.
This must match the import path.

modules.description: Modules are template repositories that this manifest requires

type.description:
Type stores a comma-separated list of template repository types served by the current module.
Use the TemplateRepositoryTypes.Contains method to check.

postRunCommand.description:
PostRunCommand is a command to be ran after rendering and post-processors
have been ran on the project

arguments.description: Arguments are a declaration of arguments to the template generator

dirReplacements.description: DirReplacements is a list of directory name replacement templates to render

TemplateRepositoryManifest.description: TemplateRepositoryManifest is a manifest of a template repository

TemplateRepositoryTypes.description: TemplateRepositoryTypes specifies what type of a stencil repository the current one is.
